name: @loopring_v2/contract-wrapper.js
description: Javascript Library for accessing Loopring Protocol v2
author: Daniel Wang

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jest
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm test && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es
scripts.build:watch: echo 'build && watch the COMMONJS version of the package - for other version, run specific tasks' && npm run build:commonjs:watch
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --config --sourcemap --output dist/lite-router.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/index.js --config --output dist/lite-router.min.js
